original_text: Now when Herod was about to bring him out, on that very night, Peter was sleeping between two soldiers, bound with two chains, and sentries before the door were guarding the prison.
korean_text: 헤롯이 잡아 내려고 하는 그 전날 밤에 베드로가 두 군인 틈에서 두 쇠사슬에 매여 누워 자는데 파수꾼들이 문 밖에서 옥을 지키더니

sentences.original_text: Now when Herod was about to bring him out
sentences.korean_translation: 헤롯이 그를 끌어내려 할 때가 되었으니

sentences.original_text: Peter was sleeping between two soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 베드로는 두 군병 사이에서 자고 있었는데
그리고 문 앞에 서 있는 파수꾼들이
